name: Daily Agenda
description: Morning summary of today's calendar events, deadlines, and time-sensitive tasks

schedule.rationale: 8am local time - early enough to plan the day, late enough that you're awake

payload.message:
Generate daily agenda for today.

Check:
1. Calendar events (if integrated)
2. Project deadlines in tracked repos (README, docs, PRs)
3. Follow-up items from yesterday's memory
4. Scheduled cron jobs that will fire today

Report format:
```
üìÖ [Day, Date]

‚è∞ Events:
- [Time]: [Event] ([Duration])
- [Time]: [Event]

üìå Deadlines:
- [Project]: [What's due]

‚úÖ Follow-ups:
- [Item from yesterday]

ü§ñ Scheduled Jobs:
- [Time]: [Job name]
```

Keep under 600 chars. If nothing scheduled, just say "Clear day - no events or deadlines."

Deliver to Telegram/Discord for morning reading.

configuration.schedule: 8am local time. Adjust 'tz' and 'expr' to your wake-up time
configuration.calendar_integration: Requires calendar access (not enabled by default in OpenClaw)
configuration.fallback: Without calendar, checks project deadlines and memory for context
configuration.delivery: Morning notification to your preferred channel
configuration.timezone: CRITICAL: Set 'tz' to your local timezone for accurate timing

tips: Pair with deadline-reminder for proactive alerts
Adjust timing to match your morning routine
Use with time-zone-aware-standups if you travel frequently
calendarSources: Project-based: README deadlines, PR review requests
Memory-based: Tasks from previous day's notes
